name: Deep Space Surfing
description:
Created for Ludum Dare 48 Jam - "deeper and deeper"

Controls - Move with Left or Right arrow keys.

Surf into the depths of space, collecting green orbs and riding green waves, while avoiding red obstacles. 

Riding green waves will increase your Intensity %,  which increases your score multiplier but also causes more difficult obstacles to come your way.  Each hit from a red obstacle will lower your Intensity %, and also increase your damage multiplier, causing future hits to lower increasing amounts of Intensity %.  At 0% Intensity, the surf is over!

Made with GameMaker: Studio 1.4
